title: Chocolate Bars
description:
A rectangular chocolate bar is divided into squares by horizontal and vertical grooves, in the usual way. It is to be cut into individual squares. A cut is made by choosing a piece and cutting along one of it grooves. (Thus each cut splits one piece into two pieces). Additionally, your chocolate is already cutted into two pieces. Write a method `countChocolateCuts` with a number answering question - what is the minimal number of cuts needed to completely cut the two parts of chocolate into all its squares?

### Examples

``` 
[[1] 
 [1, 1, 1] 
 [1]] 
&           ==> 8 
[[1, 1, 1] 
       [1] 
 [1, 1, 1]] 
```
